vstore.framework.communication.upload.threads

Class FileUploadThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • vstore.framework.communication.upload.threads.FileUploadThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, ProgressRequestBody.Listener

    public class FileUploadThread
extends java.lang.Thread
implements ProgressRequestBody.Listener
    Uploads a file to the target node. Then updates the local database and sends the new mapping to the master peer.
